### Data Transform

```{r}
clean_df <- nepal_data %>% 
  select(1:7) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = 1:7, 
               names_to = "cases", 
               values_to = "number")  %>% 
  mutate(cases = fct_reorder(cases, number)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(cases))

write_csv(clean_df, "nepal_clean_df.csv")
```


## Visualize

```{r}
ggplot(clean_df, 
       aes(x = cases, y = number)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip()
```
